channel.description: Recent content in basic on IT Quicktasks

item.title: Basic Wordpress Setup
item.description: cd /path/to/wordpress/docroot wp-cli db export ../backups/example.org_prodDB-icasimpan-2019.02.07.sql ## On new SITE (example.net) cd /path/to/new-wordpress/docroot ## update 'wp-config.php' if needed wp-cli db clean wp-cli db import /path/to/wordpress/docroot/backups/site_prodDB-icasimpan-2019.02.07.sql rsync -avz /path/to/wordpress/docroot/wp-content/ /path/to/new-wordpress/docroot/wp-content/ wp-cli search-replace example.org example.net ## PUT '--dry-run' to test first
